SmartFieldSpec.Name: Max Active Sponsorship Monthly Amount
SmartFieldSpec.Description: Maximum Monthly (converted for non-monthly frequencies) Amount of Active Sponsorships
SmartFieldSpec.Author: Cary Mayeda
SmartFieldSpec.CreateProcedureSQL:
create procedure dbo.USR_USP_SMARTFIELD_MAXACTIVESPONSORSHIPMONTHLYAMOUNT ( @ASOF datetime ) as -- write sql to calculate the smart field values based on the parameters and ASOF date select s.CONSTITUENTID, max ( case when rsch.FREQUENCYCODE = 0 then ft.TRANSACTIONAMOUNT / 12 -- Annually when rsch.FREQUENCYCODE = 1 then ft.TRANSACTIONAMOUNT / 6 -- Semi-annually when rsch.FREQUENCYCODE = 2 then ft.TRANSACTIONAMOUNT / 3 -- Quarterly when rsch.FREQUENCYCODE = 3 then ft.TRANSACTIONAMOUNT -- Monthly when rsch.FREQUENCYCODE = 6 then (ft.TRANSACTIONAMOUNT * 6) / 12 -- Bimonthly when rsch.FREQUENCYCODE = 7 then (ft.TRANSACTIONAMOUNT * 24) / 12 -- Semi-Monthly when rsch.FREQUENCYCODE = 8 then (ft.TRANSACTIONAMOUNT * 26) / 12 -- Biweekly when rsch.FREQUENCYCODE = 9 then (ft.TRANSACTIONAMOUNT * 52) / 12 -- Weekly end ) from dbo.SPONSORSHIP s join dbo.REVENUESPLIT rs on s.REVENUESPLITID = rs.ID join dbo.FINANCIALTRANSACTION ft on ft.ID = rs.REVENUEID join dbo.REVENUESCHEDULE rsch on ft.ID = rsch.ID
where s.STATUSCODE = 1 -- Active
group by s.CONSTITUENTID
